ratings.comment: Steve is super kind and helpful! He always gives constructive feedbacks to his students. As a nonnative, I could say his lectures and guidance really make me well-prepared for advanced academic English. (And he is hilarious too loooolllll)
Steve was so kind, love him very much wish he has a good health
I love my time with Steve. He is a great ESL teacher who helped me a lot. Hope I can have a class with him next year.
Steve is a great professor. Always humorous and helpful. Grading summary harshly but it helps you to learn more.
Steve is the best professor ever! He is really encouraging and caring students a lot. Also, he teaches really good! Definitely recommend!

THE BEST PROFESSOR EVER! He is a master of writing, and I am always suprised with his writing. He is super nice, and I encourage everyone to talk to him after the class (you will learn a lot!). Not many assignments besides the 3 assignments that every ESL118 classes have to do. Defintely recommand him for his humors and extreme kindness :).
Best teacher in the ESL department!!!!! He said everyone will get an A in this tough class
He is the best ESL teacher I have ever met. IF YOU WORK HARD, YOU CAN GET AN A. Very useful conference.

He is the best ESL teacher I have ever met. He is always available after or before class, he tells you what to do and helps you do some research. He also cares about yourself as a person, about lives and so on. He is not a tough grader at all, if I would have put more effort into this class, it should be an easy A.  You won't regret taking him.
The best ESL teacher ever! He is very helpful even out of class! And understand his students. Also a easy grader.
Steve is very helpful. As long as you finish your homework with hard work you will get A.

He is definitely the best teacher I ever had. He is always helpful, and he is a great friend out of class. Steve is definitely an expert on teaching students who take English as second language, and he made teaching and learning really fun.
I always looked forward to his classes. He knows his student well and teaches with passion.
He's the best teacher I've ever had!!! The class was awesome and so mun fun. He's willing to help and give a lot of helpful advices. I definately recommend him.
Great professor. Take his class if you can. You won't regret it.
He is the best English teacher I have ever had!!! Extremely helpful! He made the boring English writing class interesting. I had him for ESL 115 too. Best ESL class ever.
Best grammar teacher ever, humorous, try his best to find an interesting way to help us remember grammar rules. It's hard to get A~depends on how much effort one makes~
